speaker: SYSTEM
text: Thank you for contacting support. How can I help you today?

speaker: USER
text: I'd like to check the warranty on my purchase from last month.

speaker: SYSTEM
text: I'd be happy to help with that. Can you provide your order number or the product name?

speaker: USER
text: It's the UltraWidget Pro. Order number is RM-98234.

speaker: SYSTEM
text: Perfect! I found your order. The UltraWidget Pro comes with a 2-year manufacturer warranty covering defects and malfunctions. You're still within the warranty period until December 2026.

speaker: USER
text: That's great to know! Does it cover accidental damage?

speaker: SYSTEM
text: The standard warranty covers manufacturer defects, but accidental damage would require our Protection Plus plan. I can see you didn't purchase it originally, but you can still add it within 90 days of purchase. Would you like me to provide details?

speaker: USER
text: No, that's okay. I just wanted to confirm the warranty coverage. Thanks for the clear explanation!

speaker: SYSTEM
text: You're very welcome! If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out anytime.

speaker: USER
text: Will do. Have a great day!
